guides.title: C++ Enums vs Enum Classes: A Complete Guide
guides.description: A comprehensive guide to understanding the differences between C++98 enums and modern enum classes, including their mechanics, use cases, pitfalls, and best practices for building clean structures such as a JSON parser.
guides.author: sel-mlil

guides.title: C++98 STL Containers: Vector and Map Mastery Guide
guides.description: An exhaustive, deep-dive guide covering the STL, focusing on std::vector and std::map from basic concepts to advanced use cases, performance characteristics, and best practices essential for C++98 professional mastery.
guides.author: sel-mlil

guides.title: Lexical Analysis Mastery: Building High-Performance Lexers from Scratch
guides.description: A comprehensive deep-dive guide covering lexical analysis from basic concepts to production-ready implementations, focusing on tokenization, pattern recognition, and performance optimization essential for compiler construction and language processing.
guides.author: sel-mlil

guides.title: Recursive Descent Parsing: From Theory to Implementation
guides.description: A comprehensive guide to understanding and implementing recursive descent parsers, covering theory, practical examples, and real-world applications for compiler design and language processing
guides.author: Claude AI Assistant

guides.title: Vectors in C++98: Your Comprehensive Guide
guides.description: A detailed guide covering the functionalities, use cases, mechanics, and best practices of `std::vector` in C++98, complete with code examples and common pitfalls.
guides.author: sel-mlil

guides.title: Sockets & Poll
guides.description: Master network programming with sockets and efficient I/O multiplexing using poll
guides.author: sel-mlil

guides.title: Struct Padding & Alignment
guides.description: Comprehensive guide covering low-level programming concepts and memory management
guides.author: sel-mlil

guides.title: x86 CPU 16-bit Real Mode
guides.description: A comprehensive guide to the 16-bit Real Mode of x86 CPUs, covering its segmented memory, historical context, and role in the modern PC boot process.
guides.author: sel-mlil
